main event: A perfectly round object the size of a jet was seen moving in a straight line with a five-mile-long tail over Goodland, Kansas.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 15 seconds, The object left a brilliant white trail behind, The observation was made by a civilian pilot, The object appeared in the western sky, The report suggests that the sighting was probably caused by a meteor.
sighted object: one perfectly round object with a tail
witness description: LT A. G. Alexander, instructor pilot at NAS Hutchinson, Kansas
